page.title: 06TUTT HILL (2)
page.content:
Construction of the bridge to carry the railway over the motor-way at Tutt Hill is in progress.
The access to the centre of Tutt Hill is unusual in that the turning off the A20 is through the forecourt of a garage. This garage deals mainly in servicing vehicles and passing trade and may be forced to close down when the motor-way opens.
Both sides of the A20 Trunk road at this spot are popular parking places for Goods vehicles with drivers using the nearby toilets and mobile cafes at the roadside.
